projects.name: FixMyNEU
projects.objective:
I've been really frustrated using the student portal for Northeastern. I figured that it would be simple to reskin and add a few features. This was the first time I used Javascript, and I wanted some experience before I went needed to use it on co-op. The interface normally looks like this:
With the extension installed, it looks like this:

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.objective: This website! I had been putting off setting up a personal website for myself. In order to help other people with the same problem (but mostly myself), I set up a 'Personal Website Hackday' with nuWiT. Even though I was organizing the event, I learned a lot from the other speakers about website design, using bootstrap, and accessibility.
